msbt.message: Isn't my house really clean?I have to clean up every couple of weeks, or my ant friends won't go home.
A huh huh huh! Whaddaya think? I tried to find furniture that really felt like "me"! <10_4 />But I'm still softer.
You came all this way to see me, but I'm fresh out of my real tasty .Shoot. I wanted to share with you! But I guess "someone" ate it all, a huh huh huh!
You're welcome to come over any time.Especially if I'm home. <10_4 />And awake.

It's nice to just hang out and chat indoors like this sometimes. Because when you're indoorsyou always have the option to, like, flop down and take a nap.Doo doo doo I'm nappin'<10_4 /> Doo doo doo I'm bored now
Wow. It feels like a birthday party— or even a REGULAR party—with everyone over like this!
is here too? This is so cool.<10_4 /> So cool.
So many folks here to see ME. Wow. I feel like Mr. Popular, a huh huh huh, .
Oh wow, I dunno if I've ever had this many folks in my house at once.I wonder what's going on?
So many guests today! I got crumbs everywhere and they're gonna mess up my sorting system!
Why are so many folks here?<10_4 /> I don't remember inviting them.<10_4 /> Did I invite them? <10_4 />Mysterious.
